name: Devils Diner
description:
This game was a gamejam entry to the Vimjam 3.

 

Story:

You are a demon in dire need of hell currency. And the diner of the devil himself was hiring, so you took the job. 

But you didn't expect that all the food actually was lava could that be healthy?...

Don't run out of lava or you get fired! ( top left value )

If it is unclear what to do, there is also a  2 minute tutorial video available in the sidebar.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D = move
  • F11 = toggle fullscreen
  • O = open options
  • C = open Credits

At  the stove:

  • F = toggle placement mode
    • (in placement mode) left click = place item
    • (out of placement mode) right click = pick up item

At  the valves:

  • F or move mouse clockwise = turn up the heat!
  • Move mouse counterclockwise or walk away = stop the valves

At  the drive in:

  • F = switch active order
  • Left click / right click = deliver items

Every other intercation field (except tutorial):

  • Left click = pickup
  • Right click = drop (except at the magic storage)

Additionally a tutorial in game is available.

 

Information

All assets (besides sound effects) and programming were done during the duration of the game jam. Shaders are frequently used, which might put a high load on web or lower end devices. You can try the executable instead of the web version.
